title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 55.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 55.1 - Applicability

State Regulations

The provisions of this Part shall apply to the Fort Drum

Cooperator Area ("area"), a restricted area within the meaning of Environmental

Conservation Law ("ECL") section 11-0321, and for which a cooperation agreement
pursuant to ECL section 11-0501 is in force. The area is located in the towns
of Antwerp, Champion, LeRay, Philadelphia and Wilna in Jefferson County, and in
the town of Diana in Lewis County. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
55.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
